text: (viśvāsavantayin vana) ovunṭa ek paricchēdayak pahaḷa karanu læba, eya tamangē hṛdayanhi æti dæya eḷidarav kara harīvidō yayi vaṁcanikayin biya (vannan men ran̆gapā samaccal) karannāha. (nabiyē! ovunṭa) oba mesē kiyanu: “oba samaccal karaminma siṭinu. ehet oba biya vana dæya niyata vaśayenma allāh anivāyadæyenma eḷidarav karannēya”
